com.forgerock.opendj.cli

Class ArgumentGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.forgerock.opendj.cli.ArgumentGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<ArgumentGroup>

    public final class ArgumentGroup
extends Object
implements Comparable<ArgumentGroup>
    Class for organizing options into logical groups when argument usage is printed. To use an argument group, create an instance and use ArgumentParser#addArgument(Argument, ArgumentGroup) when adding arguments for to the parser.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ArgumentGroup(org.forgerock.i18n.LocalizableMessage description, int priority)
      Creates a parameterized instance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ArgumentGroup

        public ArgumentGroup(org.forgerock.i18n.LocalizableMessage description,
                     int priority)
        Creates a parameterized instance.
        Parameters:
        description - for options in this group that is printed before argument descriptions in usage output
        priority - number governing the position of this group within the usage statement. Groups with higher priority values appear before groups with lower priority.
